ygData.subject: Re: Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I have emailed Kyala to see if we can make some progress that way. It has been impossible for me to catch up to her in game as I am on the East coast and she
ygData.messageBody:
I have emailed Kyala to see if we can make some progress that way. It
has been impossible for me to catch up to her in game as I am on the
East coast and she works late times on the west coast. I've spent 20+
hours in the petition queue, and refuse to do that again.

Hopefully, the email will allow us to resolve this. I'll update everyone
when I get some news, but since I didn't have any yet, I was just going
to wait.

Hopefully, she will check email before she goes online and send me a
reply. I think I have an idea of what might have happened to cause this
and am asking her for some information which will confirm (or not) my
hypothesis.

Also, until I get an answer, I have to suspend efforts to get the guild
going on other servers. I will elaborate more after I have solid
information.

Thanks to everyone who has been helping with this and also, thanks for
your patience.

Hugs,
David
